FuncDef:
The roam-domain command configures the roaming domain.
The undo roam-domain command restores the default setting.
By default, the default roaming domain is default1.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the roaming domain.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 characters. The roaming domain must be existent.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When a user enters an unidentifiable domain name, the user is authenticated through the roaming domain configured on the BAS interface.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
